## Tender Details

Canada Post Corporation is seeking quotations for semi-trailers to support its operational teams in mail, parcel, and packet transportation. The selected semi-trailers must comply with the provisions of the Canada Motor Vehicle Safety Act and Regulations applicable at the time of manufacture.

Bidding and documents are available on [www.merx.com](http://www.merx.com). Fees may apply. You can find more information about pricing on https://www.merx.com/public/pricing.

You can submit a tender via [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16806438](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16806438).
